resources.string: The CheckBox provides a selectable element, usually part of a list,that toggles between two states.
CheckBox elements that are disabled cannot be interacted with and will appear faded.
Check this checkbox to control the enabled state of the boxes below.
The checkboxes below have a parent/child relationship. The parent\'s state depends on the state of the children.
Below is a checkbox with no text.
Check this checkbox to control the error state of all checkboxes in this page.
